name: Glitch Quest Redux - Onyx Demo
description:
A demo of an updated version of my old Glitch Quest entry into the Paper Jam. A first-person action adventure styled in the image of games like Daggerfall and old NES action games. Still early in development. Very short, can be beaten in about 10-20 minutes.

Made with RPG Paper Maker v1.9.5

Run the Game.exe to play.
